direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the addition of values to the Option, with processValue being more detailed and handling separators.
Both methods modify the state of the Option by either adding or clearing values.
Both methods involve validation, though validate is for option strings and addValue is for adding values.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
